TA Design’s services

[/vc_column_text]

Imagine and create it

Warranty

Free consultation and estimate

animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Imagine and create it

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Professional visualizations of pergolas and awnings set in the exterior context of houses and public or commercial buildings, from a simple photograph[/vc_column_text][nectar_cta btn_style=”arrow-animation” heading_tag=”span” button_color=”default” button_border_thickness=”0px” link_type=”regular” alignment=”left” alignment_tablet=”default” alignment_phone=”default” display=”block” display_tablet=”inherit” display_phone=”inherit” link_text=”Discover more” url=”/en/imagine-and-create-it/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all” el_id=”garanzia”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text el_id=”garanzia”]

Warranty

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Pergolas

The 5-year warranty covers structures, against all defects in construction and material, and covers the replacement of parts recognized as actually defective, excluding packing, transportation and customs charges for any replacement.

Awnings

The 5-year warranty covers structures, against all defects in construction and material, and covers the replacement of parts recognized as actually defective, excluding packing, transportation and customs charges for any replacement.

Extended Warranty and 10+ Service

Since 2011, TA Design has offered the option of extending the warranty on the structure of awnings to 10 years.

With this service, TA Design offers the opportunity to visit customers periodically over time, providing a professional service and allowing the dealer to gather all the information needed to contact the customer again whenever they wish.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all” el_id=”sopralluogo”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Free consultation and estimate

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]An inspection is essential to understand the condition of the installation and clarify the real needs and choose the best solution for each specific need TA Design offers a free consultation service that will take away any doubts.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all” el_id=”personalizzazione”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Customization

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]TA offers professional, accurate and flexible customization service. You can choose to customize the color of your awnings, from the structure to the fabric. You can also choose from a rich selection of fonts and colors, or request printing of your logo or a special design.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
